name: Wrath of the Bugpear
description: A Pear and Huckleberry medley with the slight kiss of Hibiscus
author: EdibleMalfunction

reviews.text: Really good spring vape.  Juicy melon and bright, lightly floral hibiscus with a red berry almost Hawaiian Punch light musk to it.  I lose the distinct character of the pear a bit with everything else going on, but it works to sweeten and pull the entire vape together. Super well-balanced and satisfyingly sweet. Personally I'd like a touch less pear, but that only because the rest of the juice is  a bit more interesting... but I definitely enjoy this as it's mixed right now.

Pleasant vape, sweet and juicy with fun floral top notes. Highly reminiscent of all the Honey Pearry clones and homages, but Hibiscus and Huckleberry make for a more interesting mix than the Honeysuckle and Strawberry that typically goes in those.
